title: Voormann & Friends - A Sideman's Journey (2009) [FLAC]
description:
Bassist Klaus Voormann was a sideman for dozens of great bands and artists - Manfred Mann, John Lennon, Ringo Starr, George Harrison, Howlin' Wolf, James Taylor, Billy Preston, Leon Russell, B.B. King, Carly Simon, Lou Reed, Jerry Lee Lewis, Keith Moon, Randy Mewman, Donovan, Lee Clayton and many more. This is his first solo album with contributions from Paul McCartney, Ringo Starr, Dr. John, Yusuf Islam, Joe walsh and many more
